content: Hello, I am having an issue of loading the resources for a target patient. When I load the patient of interest, I see that here exist no resources, linked to that patient. It is strange, because I see the resources just fine, if I query for them, however they don't show up in the viewer.
pasted image The following error came with it
Which patient on which server? Looks like there's a null query parameter, which is weird...
@David Hay Patient with id 240793 on the Public HAPI STU3 server
seems to be an issue with the $everything operation on HAPI for this partiuclar patient- I've filed an error report. Other patients seem to work OK
